name: Bog Brawl (Jonathan McConley, roseblood013)
description:
PLAYER 1 INSTRUCTIONS:

X: Jump

V: Kick

Space: Punch

A/D: Move Left/ Right

PLAYER 2 INSTRUCTIONS:

Numpad 8: Jump

Numpad 5: Kick

Numpad 4: Punch

Left/ Right Arrow Keys: Move Left/ Right

Jonathan McConley - Programming and Level Design

Mackenzie Harris - Art, Animation, and Music
